title: Highly efficient CuNi–ZrO2 nanocomposites for selective hydrogenation of levulinic acid to γ-valerolactone
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,27481-27487
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04960H, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Yufang Ding, Junli Sun, Rongqi Hu, Daiping He, Xulin Qiu, Chengying Luo, Ping Jiang
The Cu0.05Ni0.45–ZrO2 nanocomposite prepared by a simple coprecipitation technique exhibited outstanding catalytic performance for LA hydrogenation to GVL.
